title: bidding
description: this json represents the fields inside the bidding entity object

buyerCompanyID.description: The display id of the bidding company

buyerPrice.description: The price at which the bidding is done

broker.description: name of the broker that is doing the bidding

brokerID.description: id of the broker that is doing the bidding

currentTimeStamp.description: timestamp when the message reached the system

auctionID.description: id of the auction for which this bidding is done

sellerID.description: The seller whose auction under which this bidding is happening
